Definition: Your task is to generate the next utterance in a given dialogue. You will be given a few sentences describing the personality of the person who is making the dialogue, and a history of the dialogue after that. Each line in the history is said by one of the two participants in the conversation.

Positive Examples.input: Personality: I grew up on a farm. My brother is an animal rights activist. I've two nephews. I'm 77 years old. Chat history: -Hello, how are you this evening? -I'm ok and yourself?

Personality: I love all concerts. Madonna is my favorite singer. My brother works at Google. Chat history: -Hi there how are you? -I am doing great today just watching some music videos. And yourself? -Just seen some new Bruno mars concert while walking home. Love those guys!

Personality: I have brown hair. I love watching superheroes shows on tv. I work at my coffee shop. My favorite music genre is rock. Chat history: -Hi how are you doing today? I just started working at this great coffee house. -Doing quite well how about yourself. Are you enjoying your job? -I am good what kind of coffee do you make.

What kind of music do your listen? -Mostly pop music though! Lol what are some other hobbies you enjoy?

But it was still pretty awful.
